name: Athenaues Analytics
description: The customer is anyone who wants a patent, for their invention.

jobs.title: Computer Engineer + Data Scientist
jobs.description:
Both co-founder have technical backgrounds and have worked at high profile law firms, both in the US and the UK. We are growing rapidly and are looking to hire an experienced computer engineer + data scientist to join our team.

This is a unique opportunity as you will not only be able to contribute/build the system, but also file (and hopefully obtain) a patent (both co-founders have extensive experience in patent drafting, filing, and prosecution).
jobs.descriptionHtml:

This is a unique opportunity as you will not only be able to contribute/build the system, but also file (and hopefully obtain) a patent (both co-founders have extensive experience in patent drafting, filing, and prosecution).
skills: Machine Learning, Python, Deep Learning, AI, Angularjs, NLP.
Image Recognition, Transfer Learning, Neural Style Transfer, CNN
